com.zifang.demo.jdk.java.lang.reflect.class_info

类 ShowClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zifang.demo.jdk.java.lang.reflect.class_info.ShowClass

  • public class ShowClass
extends java.lang.Object
    A program that displays a class synopsis for the named class

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ShowClass() 

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method.
      static java.lang.String modifiers(int m)
      Return a string version of modifiers, handling spaces nicely.
      static void print_class(java.lang.Class c)
      Display the modifiers, name, superclass and interfaces of a class or interface.
      static void print_field(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
      Print the modifiers, type, and name of a field
      static void print_method_or_constructor(java.lang.reflect.Member member)
      Print the modifiers, return type, name, parameter types and exception type of a method or constructor.
      static java.lang.String typename(java.lang.Class t)
      Return the name of an interface or primitive type, handling arrays.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ShowClass

        public ShowClass()

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        The main method. Print info about the named class
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • print_class

        public static void print_class(java.lang.Class c)
        Display the modifiers, name, superclass and interfaces of a class or interface. Then go and list all constructors, fields, and methods.

      • typename

        public static java.lang.String typename(java.lang.Class t)
        Return the name of an interface or primitive type, handling arrays.

      • modifiers

        public static java.lang.String modifiers(int m)
        Return a string version of modifiers, handling spaces nicely.

      • print_field

        public static void print_field(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Print the modifiers, type, and name of a field

      • print_method_or_constructor

        public static void print_method_or_constructor(java.lang.reflect.Member member)
        Print the modifiers, return type, name, parameter types and exception type of a method or constructor. Note the use of the Member interface to allow this method to work with both Method and Constructor objects
